tool_description: The GrammarBot API provides spelling and grammar checking capabilities to your application. Submit text and receive a JSON response with potential errors and suggested corrections.
name: GrammarBot
title: GrammarBot

api_list.name: check
api_list.description: GrammarBot will check the 'text' parameter for any spelling and/or grammatical errors, and respond with suggested corrections.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: Susan go to the store everyday

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Only en-US or en-GB are supported at this time

utterances.utterance: Check the grammar and spelling of this sentence: 'She don’t like apples.'
Can you review this text for errors: 'Their going to the park later.'

parameters.text: Their going to the park later.

utterances.utterance: Please check this sentence for any mistakes: 'He has went to the store yesterday.'

parameters.text: He has went to the store yesterday.

utterances.utterance: Analyze this text for grammatical errors: 'Me and my friend is going to the movies.'

parameters.text: Me and my friend is going to the movies.

utterances.utterance: Review this sentence for spelling and grammar: 'The cat chased it’s tail.'
Check this text for any issues: 'I seen that movie last week.'

parameters.text: I seen that movie last week.

utterances.utterance: Can you correct this sentence: 'She don’t have no money.'
Please analyze this text for errors: 'The book was laying on the table.'

parameters.text: The book was laying on the table.

utterances.utterance: Check this sentence for grammar and spelling: 'He don’t know nothing about it.'

parameters.text: He don’t know nothing about it.

utterances.utterance: Review this text for any mistakes: 'The team are playing well this season.'

parameters.text: The team are playing well this season.
